Title: 18K Gold, Platinum, Pearl, Diamond & Enamel Ladies Pendant Watch CA1920s
Description: Outstanding 18K Platinum Pearl, Diamond & Enamel Lady's Pendant Watch Of The Finest Quality & Platinum 18” Neck Chain Included France; Lady's; CA1920's CASE: The 18K platinum, pearl, and diamond, 18 x 27mm case features a rectangular/open face and enamel decorations. DIAL: This silver metal dial displays Arabic numerals and has Breguet hands. MOVT: This 18-jewel, stem set movement with lever escapement is nickel with a 3/4 plate layout. C 2 (The Case is in Perfect Condition) D 2 (Dial is in Perfect Condition) M 2 (The Movement is in Perfect Condition) R 9.5 (Rarity based on a scale of #1 being very common to #10 being extremely rare) Experts Opinion: Made in France during the roaring 20's. This was a lovely lady's prize possession for many years. One of the most beautiful pendant watches we have ever found. You will never see another like this! Also included is a platinum 18” neck chain.
